Mod_active_starter :

<code>
    <div class="module main">

                <span class="leftrecent">
                   {POSTER.NAME}

             <!-- END POSTER -->
          </ul>
       </div>
    </div>
</code>

Mod_active_topic

<code>
    <div class="module main">
       <div class="starsTitle">
          <span style="float: right; padding-right: 10px;">
             <select id="changeviewrep">
                <option value="most_viewed">Xem nhiều nhất</option>
                <option value="most_active">Trả lời nhiều nhất</option>
             </select>
          </span>   
       </div> 
       <div id="most_active" class="main-content viewrep">
          <ul class="latest_topics" style="margin: -0.3em 0 !important">
             <!-- BEGIN TOPIC -->
             <li>
                <span class="leftrecent" style="width:200px!important">
                   <a href="{TOPIC.LINK}" title="{TOPIC.NAME}">{TOPIC.NAME}</a>
                </span>   
                <span class="rightnumber">{TOPIC.TITLE}</span>                                                           
             </li>
             <!-- END TOPIC -->
          </ul>
       </div>
    </div>

</code>

Recent

<code>
    <div class="module main recentWidth" style="border-right: 1px solid #DDDDDD">
       <div class="starsTitle" style="position: relative;">
          <h3>Thống kê bài viết mới
           <fieldset style="position: absolute; right: 10px; top: 5px;">
             <select id="changeFMvi" onchange="searchtopic('/search?search_keywords=&search_author=*&search_where='+this.options[this.selectedIndex].value, '23', '#recentnew ul')"></select>
          </fieldset>       
          </h3>
          <div id="proLastLoad" class="loaddingLike"></div>
       </div>
       <div id="recentnew" class="main-content" style="border: 0pt none; height: 363px">

             <div class="loaddinng"></div>
          </ul>
       </div>
       <div id="dulieupostter"></div>
    </div>

</code>
